features.title: Live Stock Prices on Portfolio Dashboard
features.summary: The Event Driven Portfolio now shows real-time Polygon stock prices that auto-refresh every 60 seconds.
features.description:
The portfolio dashboard (/sheet-portfolio) now fetches live stock prices from Polygon instead of relying on stale Google Sheet data.

**Live price overlay:** The Crrnt Px column shows real-time prices in cyan when available, falling back to the sheet price if Polygon is unreachable.

**Market data status pill:** A status indicator in the header shows a green health dot, the exact timestamp of the last market data fetch (e.g. "Mkt data 2:25:13 PM"), and an inline refresh button to fetch on demand in fast markets.

**Auto-refresh:** Prices poll every 60 seconds with a document.hidden guard so backgrounded tabs don't waste API calls.

**Recalculated yields:** Gross Yield and Current Yield columns recalculate on-the-fly using live prices, shown in cyan to distinguish from stale sheet values.

**Live price change:** The Px Chng column shows Polygon's change percentage with green/red coloring.

**Graceful degradation:** If Polygon is unavailable, all columns fall back to stale sheet values with no errors shown. The sheet Re-ingest button remains available for manual Google Sheet refreshes.
